title: 🛼 "Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness." - Desmond Tutu
🍱 "The time is always right to do what is right." - Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
🦺 "I had chosen to use my work as a reflection of my values." - Sidney Poitier
🐛 "I love to laugh." - Betty White
🎆 "You can get excited about the future. The past won't mind." - Hillary DePiano
🎿 "Do what you’re genuinely interested in and try to play to your natural strengths." - Jessica Livingston
🎀 "Only the mediocre are always at their best." - Jean Giraudoux
🍰 "Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet." - Sarah Louise Delany
🦥 "Correction does much, but encouragement does more." - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
🥑 "Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you." - Anne Lamott
🛕 "Just because you make a good plan, doesn't mean that's what's gonna happen." - Taylor Swift
🚇 "We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails." - Dolly Parton
🏰 "Make bold choices and make mistakes. It's all those things that add up to the person you become." - Angelina Jolie
🛰 "What great changes have not been ambitious?" - Melinda Gates
🪜 "Reality is one of the possibilities I cannot afford to ignore." - Leonard Cohen
🏙 "We were together. I forget the rest." - Walt Whitman
⛲ "Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me." - Carol Burnett
🌼 "Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need." - Khalil Gibran
🪝 "To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk." - Thomas A. Edison
🥙 "All you can do is try to live your best life from day to day and move forward with gratitude." - Brian Clark
🏗 "A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing." - William James
🏜 "Watching great people do what you love is a good way to start learning how to do it yourself." - Amy Poehler
📀  "Everything will change. The only question is growing up or decaying." - Nikki Giovanni
⛲️ "The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it." - Sydney J. Harris
🧺 "We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own 'to do' list." - Michelle Obama
📇 "Embrace what makes you unique, even if it makes others uncomfortable." - Janelle Monae
📀 "Computers are useless. They can only give you answers." - Pablo Picasso
🦗 "The truth is, everyone's going to hurt you. You just have to find the ones worth suffering for." - Bob Marley
🧁 "To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work." - Mary Oliver
🎇 "Beautiful days do not come to you. You must walk towards them." - Rumi
